profile.name: Shivam Shakya
profile.bio: Hey I am Shivam and this is my portfolio. I am working as a software developer in VRARMR, Delhi, India. My expertise lies in AI Development, 3D Development, and many more.
profile.projects: Over the past few years, I've had the opportunity to work on several exciting projects, from building interactive web applications to creating 3D environments and games using Unity, Unreal Engine, and Three.js.
profile.hobbies: When I'm not coding or designing, you can find me exploring new gaming trends, experimenting with virtual reality, or learning new software like Blender for 3D modeling.
